title: Endhan Uyir Thozhiyae Song Lyrics Winner
stanzas:
Enthan uyir thozhiye
kan thirnadhu paarthaai
kadhalai nana unarndhen

netri mudi oarathil
ennuyirai izhuthaai
sattendru naan vilundhen

oru kanno
en vizhiyai keeriyadhey
maru kanno
en nenjil ooriydhey

rail oadum paalam
anbae en manasin ulle
kadhal alarai oada.

Enthan uyir thozhiye
kan thirnadhu paarthaai
kadhalai nana unarndhen

netri mudi oarathil
ennuyirai izhuthaai
sattendru naan vilundhen

Un netri suzhiyil sikki
un kanna kiliyil vikki
nindren...

un neela kannil moolgi
un kadhal pirivil thangi
uchilandhen anbe

un koondhal alaikondu
un konjum mozhi kandu
naan inge
vazhaamal mannil
saaindhidavaa

sevvidhazhin nurai alli
por paadham varai killi
unnodu ondraamal
inge oaindhidavaa

Enthan uyir thozhiye
kan thirnadhu paarthaai
kadhalai nana unarndhen

netri mudi oarathil
ennuyirai izhuthaai
sattendru naan vilundhen

Enthan uyir thozhiye
kan thirnadhu paarthaai
kadhalai nana unarndhen

netri mudi oarathil
ennuyirai izhuthaai
sattendru naan vilundhen

oru kanno
en vizhiyai keeriyadhey
maru kanno
en nenjil ooriydhey

rail oadum paalam
anbae en manasin ulle
kadhal alarai oada.

seo.title: Endhan Uyir Thozhiyae Song Lyrics Winner
seo.description: Get the complete Endhan Uyir Thozhiyae Song Lyrics Winner from Winner. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Yuvan and sung by Udit Narayan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, Winner, Yuvan, pa vijay, Udit Narayan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
